title: Announcement of the Second “Declarations of Support for Regional Specialties” (METI - Ministry of Economy, ...
text: ( Source : METI - Ministry of Economy , Trade and Industry of the State of Japan ) Following the first declaration of August 27 2015 , Declarations of Support for Regional Specialties were announced in September by Toki City , Gifu Prefecture ;
